qas.question: Duke University and Shaw University are examples of what type of colleges that are in North Carolina?
What was the first black college in the south?
What is the name of the only Catholic college in the Carolinas?
What is the name of the only Lutheran University in North Carolina?

context: North Carolina is also home to many well-known <a0_0>private<a0_0/> colleges and universities, including Duke University, Wake Forest University, Pfeiffer University, Lees-McRae College, Davidson College, Barton College, North Carolina Wesleyan College, Elon University, Guilford College, Livingstone College, Salem College, <a1_0>Shaw University<a1_0/> (the first historically black college or university in the South), Laurel University, Meredith College, Methodist University, <a2_0>Belmont Abbey College<a2_0/> (the only Catholic college in the Carolinas), Campbell University, University of Mount Olive, Montreat College, High Point University, <a3_0>Lenoir-Rhyne University<a3_0/> (the only Lutheran university in North Carolina) and Wingate University.
